Professional Knowledge About the TeamThe Design team is a group of 13 highly motivated, collaborative, and fun, design professionals across Egypt, looking to add an Interior Design Professional to the department. What equips you for the role Bachelor's Degree in Architecture Engineering.
10 -12 years of experience in Interior Design, preferably in a real estate developer.
Computer skills AutoCAD, Photoshop, Excel, and PowerPoint are a must, and 3DMAX is preferred.
Excellent written and oral communication skills along with presentation techniques.Job Details
